Summary: At like 9:35 I was outside on my back porch and I saw an object moving across the night sky, moving in an easternly direction, but desending.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Mesquite
There were no other sightings in Mesquite on or around May 3rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAt like 9:35 I was outside on my back porch and I saw an object moving across the night sky, moving in an easternly direction, but desending. To me it looked like a cloud at first, but it had dim flashing lights i think, it was boomarang shape with a the point in direction of travel. I thought it was different and I had to tell someone about it. The object went below my line of sight, in a desending motion.
